remarks: Subtraction of two limits.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
sublimc.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
sublimc.2 $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
sublimc.3 $e |- H = ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) $.
sublimc.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
sublimc.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
sublimc.6 $e |- ( ph -> E e. ( F limCC D ) ) $.
sublimc.7 $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( G limCC D ) ) $.
sublimc $p |- ( ph -> ( E - I ) e. ( H limCC D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
